snippet: Two heavyweight investment groups who want to buy the Kings from the Maloof family made their cases to the N.B.A.’s advisory finance and relocation committees.
abstract: Two high-powered investment groups appear before NBA's advisory finance and relocation committees, making case for proposals to purchase Sacramento Kings from eager Maloof family; group led by Christopher Hansen intends to relocate team to Seattle, while second group headed by Mayor Kevin Johnson would allow team to remain in Sacramento.
lead_paragraph: Two heavyweight investment groups who want to buy the Kings from the Maloof family made their cases to the N.B.A.’s advisory finance and relocation committees.

headline.seo: Groups of Investors Make Pitches for Sacramento Kings
headline.main: Two Investment Groups Present Pitches for Kings
headline.print_headline:
Two Groups
Make Pitches
For the Kings
